text:
Message from Thomas on March 12 2002

BTW the getPixelToMM method is very misleading in English it is
very easy to read this as 'pixels to the millimeter' when in fact is
is just a conversion factor that can be used to go "from Pixels to
Millimeters".  The issue is that the first implies that the returned
number is 'pixels per millimeter' when in fact the number returned is
'millimeters per pixel'.
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
